item.title: Images and Gallery
item.description: This is a simple test of using hugo-easy-gallery.

item.title: New Site!
item.description:
Hi all!

I have spent the past few weeks prototyping the beta version of the ITSOC website, which is currently available here: https://beta.itsociety.club/

We have a lot more things need to be done but before proceeding, I sincerely need feedbacks from you guys ğŸ™ğŸ™ğŸ™

Visit and poke around the site, don’t feel shy to voice out your opinions or suggestions - no matter it’s good or bad (like the site is utterly ugly ğŸ‘ or the design is a pile of rubbish ğŸ—‘ï¸ etc), it’s better to say it out so that we can at least make improvements ğŸ˜

item.title: Shortcodes
item.description:
Documentation on shortcode can be found here: https://gohugo.io/content-management/shortcodes/#readout

Some example shortcodes:

{{< simple shortcode >}}

{{< shortcode >}}
    With body
{{< /shortcode >}}

{{% mdshortcode %}}
    Stuff to `process` in the *center*.
{{% /mdshortcode %}}
